dynasty.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a family of kings or other rulers whose parents, grandparents etc have ruled the country for many years
dynasty.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The Habsburg dynasty ruled in Austria from 1278 to 1918.
dynasty.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a period of time when a particular family ruled a country or area
dynasty.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a group or family that controls a particular business or organization for a long time
